note:
A Finnish non-binary sapphic, gamer, cat person, and a future software developer. Enthusiastic about fiction writing, science, and technology. Interested in increasing personal privacy. Pretty boost-heavy with occasional original content in between.

Avatar description: a light grey paper mouse with a pink nose, tilted at a 45-degree angle, on a dark grey gradient background.

Header description: a watercolor painting consisting of light and dark green textures.

#noIndex #noBot #noAI
